solution_line_template: Last year Ella made a total of ${spent_on_games} / ({percentage_on_games}) = $<<{spent_on_games}/({percentage_on_games})={last_year_salary}>>{last_year_salary}
This year with her raise, Ella's salary will be ${last_year_salary} * ({raise_percentage}) = $<<{last_year_salary}*({raise_percentage})={new_salary}>>{new_salary}
